amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision relating to the use of the National Ocean Policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike a provision relating to the use of the National Ocean Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A076) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 220 (Roll no. 477).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
